name: Ultimate Minesweeper
description:
Can you clear the minefield without hitting a mine? Put your wits to the test in this enhanced version of the classic game Minesweeper.

We've taken Minesweeper to the next level with extra lives, an optional countdown timer, and global leaderboards that let you match up against opponents worldwide.

Our "first touch" feature eliminates frustration by ensuring that the first square you reveal will never be a mine. With three difficulty levels, you're sure to be able to find a game that matches your skill level.

Ultimate Minesweeper offers a host of exciting features, including:

* Great graphics and exciting sound effects
* Global leaderboards showing fastest games and most wins
* Option for up to three extra lives per game
* Optional countdown timer
* First touch guaranteed not to hit a mine
* OpenFeint enabled.
* Automatic save when you get a phone call or exit the application

Waste time wherever you go with Ultimate Minesweeper, the ultimate classic puzzle game. Download it today and join the fun!
